formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: JabberSend Synopsis: Sends a message to a Jabber Client Privilege: system,all Description: Sends a message to a Jabber Client. Variables: Jabber: Client or transport Asterisk uses to connect to JABBER. ScreenName: User Name to message. Message: Message to be sent to the buddy
